place.name: DESKFORD
place.gazetteerText: Deskford, par., N. Banffshire, 8155 ac., pop. 849; contains Kirktown of Deskford, vil., on D. Burn, 4 miles S. of Cullen; P.O., called Deskford; the property of the Earls of Findlater and Seafield, whose ancient family seat was Deskford Tower, now demolished; Dcskford Burn flows 7½ miles N. to Moray Firth at Cullen Bay. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
